title: Scenic, 1795–1825
creditline: Gift of John Judkyn in memory of his mother, Florence Judkyn
description: Blue-gray sky background. Different varieties of flowering trees and plants with either white or pink blossoms. A perching owl and multicolored bird. At bottom, on green ground, are rocks and two gray fowl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scenic, 1795–1825.
1795–1825. Hand painted on handmade paper. Gift of John Judkyn in memory of his mother, Florence Judkyn. 1954-168-2.
